Japanese Delegation Arrives 
   Pyongyang, August 6 (KCNA) -- A women's delegation for Japan-DPRK friendship headed by Sumiko Shimizu, representative of the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women, arrived here today.
